name: Amalgam (qeeen)
description:
Amalgam is a dungeon-crawler roguelike where you gather resources and use them to craft various body parts that define your character's passive and active abilities.

(Note: Sadly we were unable to finish by submission time, as a result the inventory and crafting system does not function properly, so instead you can use 'r' to randomize your characters body parts)

WASD - controls movement
Mouse - aims
left mouse button - primary attack
right mouse button - secondary attack
esc - exit the game
